title: AuditEvent
description: Portable audit evidence event for Cori database operations

event_id.description: Unique identifier for this audit event

sequence.description: Optional sequence number for ordering within an intent

tenant_id.description: Tenant identifier the event relates to

intent_id.description: The mutation intent this event is part of

principal_id.description: The principal (user/agent) that initiated the action

step_id.description: The specific step within the plan (or '__intent__' for intent-level events)

resource_kind.description: Optional kind of resource being acted upon (e.g., 'table')

resource_id.description: Optional identifier of the resource being acted upon

allowed.description: Whether the action was allowed by policy

preview.description: Whether this is a preview/dry-run operation

decision.description: Policy decision payload including obligations and explanation

integrity.description: Optional tamper-evident fields for enterprise/WORM storage

hash.description: Hash of this event for tamper detection

prev_hash.description: Hash of the previous event in the chain
